name: Chuckie Egg 3D
description:
Originally designed and written by Nigel Alderton and released by A'n'F, this is a recreation of 8-bit classic Chuckie Egg with a pseudo-3D aspect for no good reason.  It contains all the original levels and the giant mega-goose(?).

The aim of the game is to collect all the eggs before the time runs out, and avoid all the chickens/geese/ducks, whatever they might be, and get the highest score.

Yes, it's not really 3D.  

HACKERS

If you edit the level data, you can create your own levels!

CONTROLS

  • You can use the Arrow keys or W, A, S, D.
  • Press Escape once you've had enough.
